## hpr1368 :: How to Fold a Fitted Sheet

 How to Fold a Fitted Sheet
In this episode I try to teach you how to fold a fitted sheet,
something that could earn you sheet-folding duties for the rest
of your life.

See the photo gallery at https://hackerpublicradio.org/eps/hpr1368/.

[Pictures recovered and uploaded to HPR 2015-06-19]
